WRITE_TITLE_INFO: The headline is the text indicating the nature of the article below it
WRITE_EXCERPT_INFO: The excerpt is a summary of the content or text of the perex. Leave out if you decide to not use excerpt
WRITE_URL_INFO: URL (Uniform Resource Locator) is used to reference web pages and it shows in the browser address bar
WRITE_PIN_INFO: When turned on, your content will show always show on the first place
WRITE_PEREX_INFO: Perex contains summary of the content (excerpt) and date and location
WRITE_CONTENT_HEADING_INFO: Heading divides content into smaller sections
WRITE_CONTENT_RICH-TEXT_INFO: Paragraph contains part of your text content
WRITE_CONTENT_PICTURE_INFO: Adds your picture between the content
WRITE_CONTENT_VIDEO_INFO: Adds your video between the content
WRITE_CONTENT_AUDIO_INFO: Adds your audio between the content
WRITE_CONTENT_CODE_INFO: Adds your code snippet between the code
WRITE_CONTENT_LINK_INFO: Adds link box into the content
WRITE_CONTENT_GALLERY_INFO: Adds gallery of pictures between the content
WRITE_THUMBNAIL_INFO: Thumbnail is a small picture showing next to the content link
WRITE_HEADER-IMAGE_INFO: Header image is a picture showing next to the heading
WRITE_LANGUAGES_INFO: Allows you to write different content for different languages
WRITE_ATTACHMENTS_INFO: Attach files, image or whatever you want to the content
WRITE_MENU-LINK_INFO: Adds direct link to content into selected menu
WRITE_CUSTOM-FIELDS_INFO: Custom fields contain extra metadata of content
WRITE_TAGS_INFO: Tags are used to sort content by subject
WRITE_TAGS_INPUT_INFO: When entering more tags, use comma as a separator
